downloadTitle: Microsoft Lync Server 2010 Monitoring Deployment Guide
downloadDescription: This document guides you through the process of deploying Lync Server 2010 Monitoring Server.
detailsSection: This document guides you through the process of deploying Lync Server 2010 Monitoring Server. You can use Monitoring Server to collect numerical data describing the media quality on your network and endpoints, usage information related to Voice over IP (VoIP) calls, instant messaging (IM) messages, audio/video conversations, meetings, application sharing, and file transfers, and call error and troubleshooting information for failed calls.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
